thread.title: Scott Fuselier Joins ProtectWise As Chief Revenue Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Scott Fuselier Joins ProtectWise As Chief Revenue Officer
text:
DENVER, March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Security leader ProtectWise™ today announced Scott Fuselier has joined the company in the new position of Chief Revenue Officer (CRO). Fuselier is responsible for continuing the company's growth in delivering cloud-powered network detection and response for Enterprise, Cloud and hybrid environments.
"Scott is an experienced CRO with a track record in driving significant growth for SaaS companies," said Scott Chasin, Chief Executive Officer, ProtectWise. "Scott's in-depth security and go-to-market knowledge will be a huge asset to our team as we provide further value to our customers and deliver The ProtectWise Grid to more organizations around the globe."
Fuselier brings to ProtectWise nearly two decades of experience building and leading teams to market leadership. He was most recently Chief Revenue Officer for hybrid IT assurance leader ScienceLogic. Prior to that, Scott was Senior Vice President of Sales for SaaS-based endpoint security company CrowdStrike where he drove over 100 percent growth year over year and saw the company through unicorn valuation status. He previously held Regional Director roles leading enterprise sales for McAfee and EMC/Documentum.
"ProtectWise is coming off a record year of innovation and growth in cybersecurity," said Fuselier. "I am excited to join the ProtectWise team to help expand the company's footprint as it redefines the industry with a cloud-based approach to delivering security at scale."
About ProtectWise
ProtectWise™ provides cloud-powered Network Detection and Response (NDR). The ProtectWise Grid™ captures full-fidelity network traffic from enterprise, cloud and hybrid environments, to create a lasting network memory. The company's security platform provides real-time and retrospective alerting and analysis in a rich, innovative visualizer. By harnessing the cloud, The ProtectWise Grid delivers unique advantages over current network security products, including the industry's only automated retrospection and the ease and cost-savings of an on-demand deployment model.
Founded in April 2013, ProtectWise is based in Denver and led by a team of security and SaaS industry veterans from McAfee, Palo Alto Networks and Symantec. For more information, visit www.protectwise.com .
MacLean Guthrie
ProtectWise
Email: maclean.guthrie@protectwise.com
